attributes.additional_details: It is not good for people’s mental health and well-being to keep closing the pubs and clubs and people’s businesses and finances.  The pubs need their customers and our money. It is boring staying and drinking at home and not meeting people.  Just put restrictions in the pubs like four or six people at table and table services and wearing a mask when standing up and walking
attributes.background: Change rules in Tier 2 and let pubs and clubs open in all of UK even if they not serving food.  In fact open all the pubs and clubs as it is near Christmas and New Year we all given them up most of this year.  Let us have a treat for Christmas and New Year

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561619
